title: Ultraboost 19
description: Running reinvented. These high-performance neutral running shoes deliver unrivaled comfort and energy return. The lightweight and propulsive shoes have a seamless knit upper that's engineered with motion weave technology to provide stretch while also holding your foot in place as you run. The second-skin fit follows the shape of your foot to reduce pressure points.

title: Ultraboost 18
description: Ultraboost reinvented. These running shoes reboot key performance technologies to give you a confident and energy-filled run. The knit upper has a second-skin fit and is built with motion-weave technology for adaptive stretch and support. Dual-density cushioning delivers medial support and an energized ride.

title: Alphaedge 4D
description: Insights gained from analyzing years of athlete data guided the design of these running shoes. Made to support multi-directional movement during cross training, they have a flexible yet supportive adidas Primeknit upper. The one-piece midsole has a unique open structure for responsive performance.

title: Alphabounce Beyond
description: These neutral running shoes were designed for the athlete who runs to be the best at their sport. A seamless mesh upper has strategic zones of reinforcement to support multidirectional movement. The responsive midsole flares at the forefoot and heel to give you a wide, stable platform during strength training.

title: Alphabounce Trainer
description: Get into the zone in these supportive cross-training shoes. The flexible Alphabounce midsole provides comfortable cushioning with every stride. The fused mesh upper adapts to the shape of your foot for a personalized fit and sock-like feel, and the adaptive outsole offers traction on any surface.

title: Athletics 24/7 TR
description: Get the right fit for your workout. These training shoes feature a sockfit upper that adapts to your foot for a fit that supports every step in your regimen. The stretchy mesh upper has a split tongue design for easy in and out. An additional molded sockliner helps with recovery so you can stay on the go.

title: Swift Run
description: The Swift is a casual running style that's designed for everyday wear. These stretchy knit shoes have a streamlined shape and a supportive, sock-like feel.

title: Gazelle
description: Ultimate simplicity for three decades and counting. This men's version of the Gazelle honors the favorite version of 1991, with the same materials, colors, textures and proportions as the original. The leather upper features contrast 3-Stripes and heel tab that echo the early-'90s style.

title: Tiro 19 Training Pants
description: Train hard. Stay cool. These soccer pants battle the heat with breathable, quick-drying fabric. Cut for movement, they have a slim fit down the leg and stretchy ribbed details on the lower legs to promote clean footwork. Ankle zips allow you to pull them on or off over shoes.

title: Tricolor Stacke
description: The Tricolor Stacke is new for  Lifestyle on adidas.com. Scroll through the pictures above to see more details from different angles. If you’ve tried out the Tricolor Stacke before, leave a review below to let us know what you thought.

title: Trefoil Hoodie
description: The Trefoil has been standing out since its 1972 debut. This hoodie celebrates its iconic style with a Trefoil logo front and center. A kangaroo pouch pocket keeps your everyday belongings close. The pullover sweatshirt is made of cotton French terry for a cozy feel.

title: Own The Run Shorts
description: Focus on unlocking your potential. These running shorts feature breathable, quick-dry fabric to help keep you comfortable. A high-rise waist and regular fit offer a stay-put feel from start to finish. A concealed zip pocket allows you to store small essentials.

title: Pacyr Sunglasses
description: Make more out of your run. The Pacyr Sunglasses combine a stylish look with sports-driven features. The shatterproof frame stays on your face thanks to non-slip temples and adjustable nose pads. With unobstructed peripheral vision for dashing around corners of narrow city corridors or navigating a dense forest.

title: Urban Utility 2 Backpack
description: A bold camouflage print gives this functional backpack an adventure-ready look. The spacious build includes two side pockets, a roomy main compartment and a padded laptop sleeve. The padded back panel and shoulder straps make it comfortable to carry.

title: Tote 3 Suede Backpack
description: A refined look in rich faux suede. This versatile backpack can be worn traditionally using the shoulder straps or carried as a tote by the top handles. The roomy design features a main compartment with a key fob and a lined front zip pocket for smaller items.

title: Adicolor Bucket Hat
description: Straightforward, simple and sturdy. This classic, all-cotton twill bucket hat fits loosely for a casual, easygoing feel. An embroidered Trefoil logo on the front and 3-Stripes on the back add a sporty look.

title: Mully Performance Hat
description: Attack pins with modern flair in this unstructured golf hat. It's made of lightweight soft cotton for extra comfort throughout your round. The strap-back adjuster with a buckle offers a custom fit on the links.

title: Adicross Beanie
description: Move on and off the links despite the chill. This golf beanie is made of doubleknit wool fabric for warm comfort and durable all-day wear. A fold-up brim with Adicross details keeps it casual.
